title: Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
description: The Open Mode preference is not being reset when selecting 'Restore Defaults' in the Workbench preferences.
OB: The Open Mode preference is not being reset when selecting 'Restore Defaults' in the Workbench preferences.
EB: In Build 20020521, if you go to the Workbench preferences and change the Open Mode to Single Click and select both checkboxes, and then select 'Restore Defaults', the Open Mode preference does not revert back to Double Click and the checkboxes are not cleared.
SR: When selecting 'Restore Defaults' in the Workbench preferences, the Open Mode preference should revert back to Double Click and the checkboxes should be cleared.
